name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.200.9
- Fixed several bugs and stability issues
- Namely, other characters decks will not be affected by this mod anymore
- Wiretap crashes have been fixed
- Conspire & Replay the Spire are properly optional again
- Millennium Ring has been fixed



Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
